name: John Doe
research: Checked recent funding rounds and public interviews from January 2024.
summary: Early Stage Investor focusing on SaaS and AI startups.
long_summary: John has over 10 years of experience investing in technology startups. He led Series A and B rounds for several high-profile companies. Prior to venture capital, he worked in product management at a major tech firm. Active angel investor and mentor at startup accelerators.
